an4.54:4.1: “Mendicants, there are four ways of living together.
an4.54:4.3: ~A male zombie living with a female zombie; ~a male zombie living with a goddess; ~a god living with a female zombie; ~a god living with a goddess. …
an4.54:5.1: And how does a male zombie live with a female zombie?
an4.54:5.2: It’s when the husband kills living creatures, steals, commits sexual misconduct; he uses speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, and meaningless; and he’s covetous, malicious, and has wrong view. He’s unethical, of bad character, living at home with his heart full of the stain of stinginess, abusing and insulting ascetics and brahmins.
an4.54:5.3: And the wife is also … unethical, of bad character …
an4.54:5.4: That’s how a male zombie lives with a female zombie.
an4.54:6.1: And how does a male zombie live with a goddess?
an4.54:6.2: It’s when the husband … is unethical, of bad character …
an4.54:6.3: But the wife is … ethical, of good character …
an4.54:6.4: That’s how a male zombie lives with a goddess.
an4.54:7.1: And how does a god live with a female zombie?
an4.54:7.2: It’s when the husband … is ethical, of good character …
an4.54:7.3: But the wife … is unethical, of bad character …
an4.54:7.4: That’s how a god lives with a female zombie.
an4.54:8.1: And how does a god live with a goddess?
an4.54:8.2: It’s when the husband … is ethical, of good character …
an4.54:8.3: And the wife is also … ethical, of good character …
an4.54:8.4: That’s how a god lives with a goddess.
an4.54:8.5: These are the four ways of living together.” …
